thread.title: Fiona Apple Releases Anti-Donald Trump Song About Tiny Hands Ahead Of The Women's March On Washington!
thread.title_full: Fiona Apple Releases Anti-Donald Trump Song About Tiny Hands Ahead Of The Women's March On Washington!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Fiona Apple Releases Anti-Donald Trump Song About Tiny Hands Ahead Of The Women's March On Washington!
text:
Short and simple!
Even though Fiona Apple has been pretty quiet on the music front the past few years, the songstress is using her voice for a GREAT cause -- speaking out against Donald Trump !
On Tuesday, the Criminal singer released her new song, titled Tiny Hands , which is meant to be a chant for protesters who plan to speak out during or close to Donald's inauguration on Friday in Washington D.C.
Related: The Best Anti-Donald Trump Songs! 
The track will be BEST served at the Women's March on Washington as it not only uses samples from the leaked Access Hollywood tape , but Fiona does her best to rally everyone by saying:
"We don't want your tiny hands, anywhere near our underpants."
YAAAS!
Ch-ch-check out Apple's song (below) and don't forget to look at The Wrap 's roundup of all the protest events happening around the country so you can join in! 
What do you think of Fiona's new track and will you be attending any of the protests this weekend?
[ Image via Dennis Van Tine/Future Image/ WENN . ]
